Improvements.Improvement: Refactor repetitive code into a separate method
Improvements.Description: The code to calculate `total` is repeated twice in the method. This can be refactored into a separate method to make the code more readable and reduce redundancy.

Improvements.Improvement: Replace nested if-else with guard clauses
Improvements.Description: Nested if-else statements make the code harder to read. Consider using guard clauses (early return) to simplify the code structure.
